rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
莫纳什大学的研究人员开发了一个模型来解决怀孕期间及以后的体重耻辱问题身材较大的人通常面临着普遍存在的、有弹性的社会耻辱，经常在工作场所以及教育和医疗保健环境中面临歧视。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Monash-researchers-develop-model-to-tackle-weight-stigma-in-pregnancy-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Monash-researchers-develop-model-to-tackle-weight-stigma-in-pregnancy-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41bca813-17b5-454c-8673-61aaee524c6d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:51:00 -0500 Monash researchers develop model to tackle weight stigma in pregnancy and beyond
全球糖尿病发病率飙升，数百万人未得到治疗根据《柳叶刀》世界糖尿病日之前发表的全球分析结果，全球患有 1 型或 2 型糖尿病的成年人总数已超过 8 亿，是 1990 年总数的四倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Diabetes-rates-skyrocket-globally-with-millions-left-untreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Diabetes-rates-skyrocket-globally-with-millions-left-untreatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67566f40-a8d9-478c-b6a3-17d423c30c9a Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:49:00 -0500 Diabetes rates skyrocket globally with millions left untreated
音乐疗法能否成为痴呆症护理迫切需要的突破？音乐疗法通过满足未满足的需求、增强护理人员与患者的理解以及在机构护理环境中培养人性化联系来减轻晚期痴呆症患者的痛苦并改善其福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Can-music-therapy-be-the-breakthrough-dementia-care-desperately-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Can-music-therapy-be-the-breakthrough-dementia-care-desperately-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68228233-896c-42d1-b034-577f7fb35342 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:49:00 -0500 Can music therapy be the breakthrough dementia care desperately needs?
新的临床试验为罕见免疫疾病 IgG4-RD 患者带来希望由麻省总医院布里格姆分校研究人员领导的团队证明，inebilizumab 可使患有免疫球蛋白 G4 相关疾病 (IgG4-RD) 的罕见疾病的患者出现症状的风险降低 87% https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-clinical-trial-offers-hope-for-病人-with-rare-immune-disease-IgG4-RD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-clinical-trial-offers-hope-for-病人-with-rare-immune-disease-IgG4-RD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1ce1473-9608-4a52-9ab0-0496b09c480f Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:45:00 -0500 New clinical trial offers hope for patients with rare immune disease IgG4-RD
CARMAT 的 Aeson 设备作为移植桥梁解决方案在欧洲势头强劲CARMAT（FR0010907956，ALCAR）是世界上最先进的全人工心脏的设计者和开发商，旨在为患有晚期双心室心力衰竭（“CARMAT”）的患者提供一种治疗替代方案，提供了 Aeson® 人工心脏的最新进展：移植到欧洲的桥梁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/CARMATs-Aeson-device-gains-momentum-in-Europe-as-a-bridge-to-transplant-solution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/CARMATs-Aeson-device-gains-momentum-in-Europe-as-a-bridge-to-transplant-solution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e60c122b-6d06-4213-a860-ad209fca106f Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:41:00 -0500 CARMAT's Aeson device gains momentum in Europe as a bridge-to-transplant solution
亚精胺调节 RIPK1 对抗糖尿病和血管损伤研究人员发现，亚精胺介导的 RIPK1 乙酰化可抑制坏死性凋亡和胰岛素抵抗，为 2 型糖尿病提供潜在的治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Spermidine-regulates-RIPK1-to-combat-diabetes-and-angio-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Spermidine-regulates-RIPK1-to-combat-diabetes-and-angio-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ed2a156-d7db-4978-bb1b-bc9864a1d5c6 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 00:21:00 -0500 Spermidine regulates RIPK1 to combat diabetes and vascular damage
新抗原 DNA 疫苗可提高三阴性乳腺癌患者的生存率和免疫力一项新的一期试验证明了个性化新抗原 DNA 疫苗的安全性和有效性，显示出有希望的免疫反应，并改善了高风险三阴性乳腺癌患者的无复发生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Neoantigen-DNA-vaccines-improve-survival-and-immunity-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Neoantigen-DNA-vaccines-improve-survival-and-immunity-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8ab067e-c25a-4d0d-bfd5-54ca14a7afbe Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:56:00 -0500 Neoantigen DNA vaccines improve survival and immunity in triple-negative breast cancer patients
工程化 SNIPR 改变了 CAR T 细胞的精确度，实现更安全的癌症治疗研究人员开发了 SNIPR，这是一种感知可溶性配体的创新受体，能够实现 CAR T 细胞的精确治疗控制。这一突破增强了肿瘤靶向性，同时减少了脱靶效应，为先进的合成生物学应用铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-SNIPRs-transform-CAR-T-cell- precision-for-safer-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-SNIPRs-transform-CAR-T-cell- precision-for-safer-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e51b793-eda2-41ce-b644-0472c983b110 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:41:00 -0500 Engineered SNIPRs transform CAR T-cell precision for safer cancer therapy
生长激素释放激素改变健康和慢性疾病的治疗潜力研究人员回顾了生长激素释放激素及其类似物的生物活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Growth-hormone-releasing-hormone-transforms-therapeutic-potial-in-health-and-chronic-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Growth-hormone-releasing-hormone-transforms-therapeutic-potial-in-health-and-chronic-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f412c90b-ed9f-4938-9b2c-d422de9d2899 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:22:00 -0500 Growth hormone-releasing hormone transforms therapeutic potential in health and chronic disease
工程病毒样颗粒不断进化以实现卓越的基因传递效率研究人员开发了一种用于工程病毒样颗粒 (eVLP) 的条形码定向进化系统，创建了具有增强的生产、转导和基因编辑效率的第五代 (v5) eVLP。该系统可以为治疗应用中改进基因递送载体铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-virus-like-articles-evolve-for-superior-gene-delivery-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-virus-like-articles-evolve-for-superior-gene-delivery-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3a01f36-c360-4cbe-92e3-e5c78e038125 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:12:00 -0500 Engineered virus-like particles evolve for superior gene delivery efficiency
